channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- Huawei USG6000V
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- Huawei USG6000V

item.title: CVE-2020-1863|2024-08-04T06:53:58.774Z -- huawei -- huawei%20usg6000v
item.description: Huawei USG6000V with versions V500R001C20SPC300, V500R003C00SPC100, and V500R005C00SPC100 have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Due to a logical flaw in a JSON parsing routine, a remote, unauthenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to disrupt service in the affected products.
